metadata.name: HackTool - RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Execution
metadata.comment: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook a automated breach emulations utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gthread-3.6.dll')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\tmp.bat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sigcmm-2.4.dll'))))

output.summary: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook a automated breach emulations utility
